attributes.action: Petition in response to the petition to  choice to repeal Scottish devolution
attributes.background: The ludicrous, infantile petition 'Hold a referendum in Scotland to give the country a choice to repeal devolution' is dangerous to our democracy and to the our future of our children. Currently they have 1,091 signatures over 3 days. Let us as free thinkers join together to smash their petition.

rejection.details: If you'd like the UK Government to reject any calls to repeal devolution in Scotland, then you could start a new petition asking for that.
